headline: Truist sees ‘several avenues’ of earnings growth for Booking Holdings
summary: Investing.com -- Truist analyst Gregory Miller upgraded Booking Holdings (NASDAQ: BKNG) to Buy from Hold in a note on Monday, citing long-term growth in Asian travel markets, steady global economic expansion, and an improved valuation backdrop.

headline: Why Investors Need to Take Advantage of These 2 Retail-Wholesale Stocks Now
summary: The Zacks Earnings ESP is a great way to find potential earnings surprises. Why investors should take advantage now.

headline: Pipedrive Accelerates Its Next Chapter with Three New C-Level Leaders
summary: NEW YORK, October 27, 2025--Pipedrive, the easy and effective sales CRM for small companies, today announced three senior appointments to its executive team, marking a key step in the company’s next phase of growth. Joe Futty joins as Chief Product and Technology Officer, Steven Quach as Chief Marketing Officer, and Jonny Carroll as Chief Data and Analytics Officer. Together, they bring decades of experience from leading global consumer and technology brands, including Booking.com, Expedia Group

raw.summary: NEW YORK, October 27, 2025--Pipedrive, the easy and effective sales CRM for small companies, today announced three senior appointments to its executive team, marking a key step in the company’s next phase of growth. Joe Futty joins as Chief Product and Technology Officer, Steven Quach as Chief Marketing Officer, and Jonny Carroll as Chief Data and Analytics Officer. Together, they bring decades of experience from leading global consumer and technology brands, including Booking.com, Expedia Group
